Outlaw.definition: a person excluded from the benefit or protection of the law [a trespasser is not an ] 2
Outlaw.origin: [Old English tlaga , from Old Norse tlagi , from t out + lag lg law]

1.definition: a person excluded from the benefit or protection of the law [a trespasser is not an ]

2.definition: a lawless person or a fugitive from the law

3.definition: a person or organization (as a nation) under a ban or restriction or considered to be in defiance of norms or laws [considered an for its support of terrorism]vtto make illegal
